DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess treatment facial rejuvenation use standard hand piece Lens Array 755nm Alexandrite laser .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Histological Evaluation Picosure 755nm Laser With Cap Array Facial Rejuvenation

The subject female pregnant , pregnant within last 3 month , currently breast feed plan pregnancy study period . 2 .
